name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch chat reloader for K_i_ra's channel

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads last 50 (by default) messages from K_i_ra's Twitch channel chat automatically after resfresh (by default) orâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension loads last 50 (by default) messages from K_i_ra's Twitch channel chat automatically after resfresh (by default) or by clicking on the "request" button. Also it can save and load again messages from local chat in your browser via corresponding buttons.

Version 0.2:
- Fixed sometimes not properly showing emotes
- Fixed a bug when messages load in another chats
- Added links highlighting
